definition: to be called/to be known as
to shout/to call/to order/to ask/to be called/by (indicates agent in the passive mood)

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance

sentences.english: Have you ever known there are such creatures as an albino two-headed snake?
sentences.chinese: 你知道這個世界上有一種叫做雙頭白化蛇的生物嗎？

sentences.english: "Your lecture is called 'From Satori to Silicon Valley, ' " he explained.
sentences.chinese: “你的講座叫做‘從禪悟到硅谷’，”他解釋道。

sentences.english: This is what I like to call the “hard work” model.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我喜歡叫做“艱辛工作”的工作模式。

sentences.english: A powerful personal growth tool is the 30-day trial.
sentences.chinese: 有一種個人成長的有效工具，叫做“30天試驗”。

sentences.english: and macromolecular clumps of organic material called kerogen.
sentences.chinese: 最後是一種叫做油母質的大分子化合物。

sentences.english: One trade group has turned to a rock band called Gyoko, or Fishing Port.
sentences.chinese: 某個行業團體已經求助一個叫做“漁港”的搖滾樂隊。

sentences.english: But if you always need to wipe your hands or often sweat through your clothes, it may be more than a "guy" thing. It could be excessive sweating, called hyperhidrosis.
sentences.chinese: 這是過度出汗，叫做多汗症。

sentences.english: Chico also was known for performing what was called the comedy of the absurd.
sentences.chinese: Chico也因爲出演被叫做荒誕劇的劇目而出名。

sentences.english: In the industry, these are called "chargebacks."
sentences.chinese: 在衆籌行業中，這就叫做“退單拒付”。

sentences.english: A lost item in the hole is also called "junk".
sentences.chinese: 落在井內的部件也叫做“井底髒物”。

sentences.english: There's a businessman named Rob in one of my classes.
sentences.chinese: 有一位叫做羅勃的商人跟我修同一門課。

sentences.english: The one thing he did tell the truth about is what his name was.
sentences.chinese: 只有一件事是真的，那就是他真的叫做克里斯李。

sentences.english: Bone cells or osteocytes are contained in spaces called lacunae.
sentences.chinese: 骨骼細胞或者是骨細胞存在於叫做空隙的空間裏。

sentences.english: If it is referring to the Shinto shrine, then known as the Torii gate.
sentences.chinese: 如果是指神道教的神社的話，那個門叫做鳥居。

sentences.english: The name for this border between lunar night and day is the terminator line.
sentences.chinese: 我們把月亮上的黑白邊界線叫做‘晨昏線’。

definition: to shout/to call/to order/to ask/to be called/by (indicates agent in the passive mood)
called/to call sth (by a name)/to name
to be called/to be known as
to be called/to be known as
name (of a person or thing)/CL:個|个[ge4]
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
idea/opinion/meaning/wish/desire/interest/fun/token of appreciation, affection etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to give as a small token/to do sth as a gesture of goodwill etc
